title: SBI plans innovative products to attract depositors amid growing financial awareness
description: The State Bank of India plans to introduce innovative financial products, including a mix of recurring deposits and Systematic Investment Plans (SIP), to attract more depositors. SBI's Chairman, C S Setty, emphasized the need to meet evolving customer needs and highlighted the bank's focus on balanced interest rates and superior customer service.
